content:
International Brain Initiative
Data Standards and Sharing Working Group Symposium

WHEN: April 23 10:30 - 12:30 EST / 16:30 - 18:30 CET / 23:30 - 01:30 JST

This session will introduce the IBI and the current efforts of the Data Standards and Sharing Working Group with a view to gain input from a wider neuroscience and neuroinformatics community.

WHERE: The event will be live streamed via this link:
https://www.internationalbraininitiative.org/events/data-sharing-standards-wg-symposium
